If you get the message "Insert correct cd", then what you need to do is this- 
Copy the crack, which you can find in the folder called "HOODLUM", copy and replace it in the folder "system". Then uninstall the game completely and install it once again. It needs the crack in the installation for the crack to work.
Word up
